lines.text: Are we gonna rob 'em or we gonna fuck 'em?

[snorting cocaine]
You want some of this?
Man, I don't stick nothing up my nose unless it's two legs wrapped around my neck.
Welcome home, convict! A very touching story, my hemorrhoids bleed for you.
Ma', I don't know where my teeth are. Hey pa', are you wearing my teeth?
Men love to hate. It's what separates us from the females of the spieces. It's the natural law in Wild America.
You are not in the position to say who goes and who stays.
